John Robinson (18 April 1936 – June 2019) was an English professional footballer. He played as a winger.
Robinson was born in Chorley. He first played for Leyland Motors before signing for Bury in 1954. In a total of 127 appearances for Bury, he scored 21 goals. He signed for Oldham Athletic in 1961, playing three league games for the club. He died in early June 2019, at the age of 83.
